articles.author: Tom Kershaw
articles.title: Azeem Rafiq apologises after historical antisemitic text messages emerge
articles.description: Azeem Rafiq has issued an apology after a text message conversation emerged in which he used antisemitic slurs when discussing another cricketer in 2011.
articles.content:
